title: PATRIOTS SIGN ANTONIO BROWN - Emergency Podcast (9/7)
description:
Antonio Brown is no longer a Raider, but he is a Patriot! In yet another emergency update, Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech react to news that AB has signed with New England just hours after his release from Oakland. The guys break all angles down from winners and losers to fantasy and gambling. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
